hero.title: MiniMax Hailuo 02 ‚Äì Text & Image-to-Video Engine
hero.intro: MiniMax‚Äôs Hailuo 02 engine outputs short, stylized clips from a prompt alone or by animating a still frame. Sketch motion, experiment with transitions, or build mood-driven loops at a fraction of premium-engine costs.

overview: Spin up stylized 6‚Äì10 second clips from text or upload a key frame to guide the motion. Hailuo 02 is silent, fast, and ideal for storyboards, transitions, and proof-of-motion explorations.

promptStructure.title: Prompt structure
promptStructure.quote: ‚ÄúStylized fox sprinting through a windy forest, camera follows from behind, swirling leaves, cinematic depth of field.‚Äù
steps: Describe a clear subject in motion with a strong verb
Layer environmental movement‚Äîwind, fog, leaves, shadows
Call out cinematic camera cues: pan, follow, tracking, zoom
Mention if you‚Äôre uploading a reference or end frame for image-to-video
Use two to three sentences maximum for consistent output

prompts.title: Control room drift
prompts.prompt: Zoom slowly across a sci-fi spaceship control room, blinking lights and flickering screens, low-poly animation style. Upload the key frame as reference.

faqs.q: Why choose MiniMax over premium engines?
faqs.a: Hailuo 02 offers a strong price-to-quality ratio for volume campaigns. It‚Äôs excellent for social ads, explainers, and iterative concepting where you need dozens of clips without draining credits.
Keep prompts structured but concise‚Äîtwo to three sentences covering setting, motion, and tone. Overly long descriptions can introduce artifacts, while focused cues stay consistent.
Route the resulting clip through the MaxVideoAI upscaler or rerun the same prompt in Veo 3 Fast for a sharper pass. Pricing transparency helps you compare before committing credits.

pricingNotes: Live pricing updates inside the Generate workspace. Check the current rate before you run a job.
